title: Suspended for being new "trolling"
body:
GJ riot suspending me for "trolling" or being new to the game. Team calls me feeder and troll i get reported by "dynamic trio" and boom there ya go. SO BALANCED. I dont see their chat logs ? why only mine ? i wasnt smack talking noone all game, someone do something man im tired of these bans coming from every game.


Hide Yo Kids GG: getting objectives ?
Hide Yo Kids GG: didnt know you could report for that, muting team so toxic
Hide Yo Kids GG: 1V1 ME VAYBNE
Hide Yo Kids GG: VAYNE
Hide Yo Kids GG: ashe go back to lane
Hide Yo Kids GG: you letting him free farm
Hide Yo Kids GG: dynamic duo op
Hide Yo Kids GG: i call lane " everyone else" says "ashe called it first"
Hide Yo Kids GG: dynamic duo OP
Hide Yo Kids GG: the power of the duo
Hide Yo Kids GG: gets me banned
Hide Yo Kids GG: xD
Hide Yo Kids GG: oh my bad trio *

Hide Yo Kids GG: and/

Hide Yo Kids GG: i get

Hide Yo Kids GG: im new to the game
Hide Yo Kids GG: okay?
Hide Yo Kids GG: get over it
Hide Yo Kids GG: play the game
Hide Yo Kids GG: im not feeding ?
Hide Yo Kids GG: im 1/9
Hide Yo Kids GG: since
Hide Yo Kids GG: min 5
Hide Yo Kids GG: havent died
Hide Yo Kids GG: since then
Hide Yo Kids GG: ?
Hide Yo Kids GG: banned o.o
Hide Yo Kids GG: im playing
Hide Yo Kids GG: yes i am
Hide Yo Kids GG: doing my lane
Hide Yo Kids GG: playing jg
Hide Yo Kids GG: not "feeding
Hide Yo Kids GG: i dont care if you report or not
Hide Yo Kids GG: im playing
Hide Yo Kids GG: for fun
Hide Yo Kids GG: doing my JG
Hide Yo Kids GG: which is my lane?
Hide Yo Kids GG: dot wanna feed
Hide Yo Kids GG: dont*
Hide Yo Kids GG: for not grouping ?
Hide Yo Kids GG: and learning how not to feed?
Hide Yo Kids GG: oh ok
Hide Yo Kids GG: hope not then
Hide Yo Kids GG: im new to the game
Hide Yo Kids GG: and you called me feeder
Hide Yo Kids GG: ill help when im stronger
Hide Yo Kids GG: im "trash"
Hide Yo Kids GG: how am i trolling ?
Hide Yo Kids GG: omg this team
Hide Yo Kids GG: i stop feeding and you still call me "troll"
Hide Yo Kids GG: ?
Hide Yo Kids GG: i learned from my mistakes im not gonna go for objectives wide open
Hide Yo Kids GG: they calling me troll
Hide Yo Kids GG: for
Hide Yo Kids GG: jg
Hide Yo Kids GG: i have not talked at ALL
Hide Yo Kids GG: they keep flaming me
Hide Yo Kids GG: for doing my jg camps freely
Hide Yo Kids GG: they call me "trash" and then they need my help to win?
Hide Yo Kids GG: braum
Hide Yo Kids GG: .....
Hide Yo Kids GG: how
Hide Yo Kids GG: am i trolling ?
Hide Yo Kids GG: explain

replies.body: You sure do use a lot of in game lingo for being new to the game.
This^.I didnt even knew how to use chat when I was new to the game. XD
I suspect you were given a restriction for continuing a flame fight all game rather than just muting and moving on.

> [{quoted}](name=EvilDustMan,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rxeAI9FW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-14T23:03:55.056+0000)
>
> I suspect you were given a restriction for continuing a flame fight all game rather than just muting and moving on.

He had to "defend himself."
You're toxic as hell. How can you not see that?

..You spamming, flamed, made a giant nuisance of yourself and acted incredibly immature. What do you expect?

If this was actually an account ban, you have done this at least 5+ times before, with chat restriction warning. Shape up your attitude or you will get permbanned.

TL;DR Being new is not an excuse for running your mouth and being rude.
u typed too much, ban-able offense.
